text: Satish Chandra (20 November 1922 â€“ 13 October 2017) was an Indian historian whose main area of specialisation was medieval Indian history. Chandra has been described as of India's leading scholars of the Moghul period and as one of India's most influential historians. His book, Medieval India, has been widely used as a textbook in schools and colleges around India. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2017 deaths Category:20th-century Indian writers Category:Indian historians Category:People from Uttar Pradesh
